title: Playing Cards
description: A standard deck of 52 playing cards

title: Charades
description: A fun game where players act out a word or phrase without speaking.

title: Most Likely
description:
Who's the most likely to do something? Find out with this fun game!

Draw a card, read aloud, and on the count of 5 everyone points to the person they think is most likely to do that thing. The person with the most fingers pointed at them wins the round!

Who is the biggest drama queen?
Who is most likely to trip over their own feet?
Who is most likely to talk their way out of a speeding ticket?

title: Morning Pages
description: Morning Pages is a daily journaling practice where you write three pages of stream-of-consciousness writing. Here are some prompts to get you started

cards.title: What are your favorite memories from childhood?
What are your favorite holiday traditions?
What are your favorite family traditions?
What are your favorite things about your home?
What are your favorite things about your job?
What are your favorite things about your friends?
What are your favorite things about your partner?
What are your favorite things about your pets?
What are your favorite things about your community?
What are your favorite things about your city?
What are your favorite things about your country?
What are your favorite things about your culture?
What are your favorite things about your heritage?
What are your favorite things about your religion?
What are your favorite things about your spirituality?
What are your favorite things about your body?
What are your favorite things about your mind?
What are your favorite things about your personality?
What are your favorite things about your life?
What are your favorite things about your future?
What are your favorite things about your past?
What are your favorite things about your present?
What are your favorite things about your dreams?
What are your favorite things about your goals?
What are your favorite things about your achievements?
What are your favorite things about your failures?
What are your favorite things about your challenges?
What are your favorite things about your successes?
What are your favorite things about your opportunities?
What are your favorite things about your experiences?
What are your favorite things about your lessons?
What are your favorite things about your growth?
What are your favorite things about your journey?
What are your favorite things about your path?
What are your favorite things about your adventure?
What are your favorite things about your exploration?
What are your favorite things about your discovery?
What are your favorite things about your creativity?
What are your favorite things about your imagination?
What are your favorite things about your inspiration?
What are your favorite things about your motivation?
What are your favorite things about your determination?
What are your favorite things about your perseverance?
What are your favorite things about your resilience?

title: Emojis! 🤡👍🐶
description: All the emojis! Use these cards to play charades, pictionary, or any other game that needs a random emoji!

title: Juggling Practice
description: A deck for practicing juggling. Practice the top card for 5 minutes, discard it and move on to the next card. When you've done them all, shuffle the deck and start again. Add new cards as you learn new tricks and remove cards you don't enjoy.

cards.title: 3 ball cascade
cards.description: The basic pattern of juggling. Throw each ball in an arc from one hand to the other, so that each ball is caught in the opposite hand.

cards.title: 3 ball shower
cards.description: Throw two balls in an arc from one hand to the other, and the third ball in a high arc from the same hand to the other. The balls should be caught in the same order they were thrown.

cards.title: 3 ball columns
cards.description: Throw all three balls straight up and down, so that they land in the same hand they were thrown from.

cards.title: 3 ball reverse cascade
cards.description: Throw each ball in an arc from one hand to the other, but catch them in the same hand they were thrown from.

cards.title: 3 ball mills mess
cards.description: Throw the balls in a circular pattern, so that each ball is caught by the opposite hand.

cards.title: 3 ball box
cards.description: Throw the balls in a square pattern, so that each ball is caught by the opposite hand.

cards.title: 3 ball half shower
cards.description: Throw one ball in a high arc and the other two in a lower arc, catching them in the same order they were thrown.

cards.title: 3 ball tennis
cards.description: Throw one ball in a high arc and the other two in a lower arc, catching them in the same order they were thrown, but with one ball always being thrown higher.

cards.title: 3 ball snake
cards.description: Throw the balls in a pattern that resembles a snake, with each ball following the previous one.

cards.title: 3 ball windmill
cards.description: Throw the balls in a circular pattern, with each ball following the previous one in a windmill-like motion.

cards.title: 3 ball factory
cards.description: Throw the balls in a pattern that resembles a factory, with each ball following the previous one in a mechanical motion.

cards.title: 3 ball yo-yo
cards.description: Throw the balls in a pattern that resembles a yo-yo, with each ball following the previous one in an up-and-down motion.

cards.title: 3 ball shower with a twist
cards.description: Throw the balls in a shower pattern, but with a twist in the middle of the pattern.

cards.title: 3 ball under the leg
cards.description: Throw the balls in a pattern that involves throwing one ball under your leg.

cards.title: 3 ball behind the back
cards.description: Throw the balls in a pattern that involves throwing one ball behind your back.

cards.title: 3 ball over the shoulder
cards.description: Throw the balls in a pattern that involves throwing one ball over your shoulder.

cards.title: 3 ball under the arm
cards.description: Throw the balls in a pattern that involves throwing one ball under your arm.

cards.title: 3 ball claw catch
cards.description: Catch the balls with a claw-like motion, grabbing them out of the air.

cards.title: 3 ball penguin catch
cards.description: Catch the balls with your hands turned inward, like a penguin.

cards.title: 3 ball backcross
cards.description: Throw the balls in a pattern that involves crossing your arms behind your back.

cards.title: 3 ball multiplex
cards.description: Throw multiple balls at once, catching them in the same order they were thrown.

cards.title: 3 ball flash
cards.description: Throw all three balls in the air at once, catching them in the same order they were thrown.

cards.title: 3 ball cascade with a spin
cards.description: Throw the balls in a cascade pattern, but with a spin in the middle of the pattern.

cards.title: 3 ball shower with a spin
cards.description: Throw the balls in a shower pattern, but with a spin in the middle of the pattern.

cards.title: 3 ball columns with a spin
cards.description: Throw the balls in a columns pattern, but with a spin in the middle of the pattern.

cards.title: 3 ball reverse cascade with a spin
cards.description: Throw the balls in a reverse cascade pattern, but with a spin in the middle of the pattern.
